content:
Back in my day "mindfulness" wasn't a thing. We were mindful half the time because we didn't have a choice. We didn't have infinite entertainment in our pockets. 
You're waiting for someone? You waited. Mindfulness. 
You're on the bus? You're on the bus, watching condensation drip. Mindfulness. 
These days you would be considered a guru if you were that mindful. 
Return a VHS? You gotta rewind that. Mindfulness. 
There were times when we were forced to be with ourselves. We used to take a shit. Just shit.
